channel.title: books on Cattleguard Blog
channel.description: Recent content in books on Cattleguard Blog

item.title: This Year In Books
item.description: This year I read .916 books per month, which is several more books than I thought I’d be allowed to read given I have two small children. Fiction House Made of Dawn by N. Scott Momaday - This is a wonderful book and opens with writing reminiscent of East of Eden. Brighton Rock by Graham Greene Under the Volcano by Malcolm Lowry Stats, Risk, Etc. Trading Bases by Joe Peta The Flaw of Averages by Sam Savage The Tyranny of Metrics by Jerry Z.
